entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
